original_title: Woodkid - Feat Orchestre National de Lyon - Nuit de fourvière
overview: What better than an antique theatre, sublimed by the Lyon National Orchestra, to host home-born Yoann Lemoine – better known as Woodkid around the world – with the symphonic whirlwinds and martial cadences of his first fantastic album and global concept, The Golden Age?
title: Woodkid - Feat Orchestre National de Lyon - Nuit de fourvière
